thread.title: Long delays on A12 after boat comes off trailer | Anglia
thread.title_full: Long delays on A12 after boat comes off trailer | Anglia - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Long delays on A12 after boat comes off trailer | Anglia
text:
Drivers heading north on the A12 in Suffolk and Essex faced long delays after a boat came off a trailer.
It happened at Ardleigh near Colchester when the trailer jack-knifed, blocking the carriageway
The boat blocked the Northbound carriageway of the A12 at Ardleigh Credit: Steve Pearce People heading to the Ipswich Town game were caught up in the jam, including the Reading team bus.
The boat blocked the Northbound carriageway of the A12 Credit: Steve Pearce One lane is open and traffic is moving again.
Last updated Sat 4 Feb 2017 Essex Suffolk
